file_content.text: Lieutenant. You have your choice of either the Commando or Vanguard advanced training program--quite an honor.
Commandos specialize in hitting the enemy as hard as possible. Their training focuses on assault cannons, specialized blaster munitions, and advanced medical probes.
Vanguards focus on short range combat maneuvers that keep them up close and personal. Plus they get all the latest defensive tech--they're like walking fortresses.
Just remember, whether you choose Vanguard or Commando, you're in it for good. The training doesn't stop until you kick it or retire. So what's it going to be?
I was born to be a Commando.
All right, your forms are filed--you're officially a Commando, Lieutenant.
Sign me up as a Vanguard.
The Vanguard program will be proud to have you, Lieutenant.
See your training officer when you're ready to get started. Dismissed.
See your training officer when you're ready to get started. Dismissed.
Fair enough--this isn't something to go into lightly. Dismissed.
